testsuite.name: uon.spring_blog.config.jwt.TokenProviderTest

testcase.name: validToken():유효한 토큰인 때에 유효성 검증에 성공한다.
validToken():만료된 토큰인 때에 유효성 검증에 실패한다.
generateToken():유저정보와 만료기간을 전달해 토큰을 만들수 있다.

testsuite.system-out: 2025-09-01T09:56:24.139+09:00 INFO 6880 --- [spring_blog] [ Test worker] t.c.s.AnnotationConfigContextLoaderUtils : Could not detect default configuration classes for test class [uon.spring_blog.config.jwt.TokenProviderTest]: TokenProviderTest does not declare any static, non-private, non-final, nested classes annotated with @Configuration. 2025-09-01T09:56:24.154+09:00 INFO 6880 --- [spring_blog] [ Test worker] .b.t.c.SpringBootTestContextBootstrapper : Found @SpringBootConfiguration uon.spring_blog.SpringBlogApplication for test class uon.spring_blog.config.jwt.TokenProviderTest Hibernate: insert into users (email, nickname, password, id) values (?, ?, ?, default)
